Name: 道不可道
About the game: This is a rougelike game that continues to explore, develop, and fight automatically in the form of choosing one from three. Players can gain spiritual energy and transform spiritual power through battles, so that their own strength can be improved. After three difficulties in the first, middle and late stages, they can reach the realm to perfection, and face the terrible catastrophe to try to break through or die under the catastrophe. In each journey of seeking the Tao, players can choose different exercises and magic weapons to help them go further, but at the same time, it should be noted that every time you learn exercises and practice magic weapons, it will also affect your mind, if it is the mind If it is too low, maybe you will see the unspeakable way...
